message.content: {"id": "42724", "title": "Bug 42724 - StyledText selection rendered incorrectly on bidi platforms", "description": "Bug 42724 - StyledText selection rendered incorrectly on bidi platforms. When using the attached BidiUtil, there is a bug in the selection rendering code in DisplayRenderer.drawLineSelectionBackground. It seems that the entire selection background is redrawn even though StyledTextRenderer.drawLine already creates a style range for the selection.", "OB": "The selection background includes unselected characters on bidi platforms when using the BidiUtil.", "EB": "", "SR": "Build 20030903 - Steps to reproduce: 1. Use the attached BidiUtil. 2. Type one English character followed by three or more Arabic/Hebrew characters. 3. Place the caret at the beginning of the line. 4. Select the next two characters, including one bidi character. The selection background should only include the selected characters."}

origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '42724', 'title': 'Bug 42724StyledText  selection rendered incorrectly on bidi platforms', 'description': "Bug 42724StyledTextselection rendered incorrectly on bidi platforms I don't believe we even needto redraw the entire selection background anymore because there is code inStyledTextRenderer.drawLine that creates a style range for the selection. ", 'OB': '', 'EB': '', 'SR': 'build 20030903The attached BidiUtil exposes a bug in the selection rendering code inDisplayRenderer.drawLineSelectionBackgroundSteps to reproduce:using the attached BidiUtil type one english character followed by three ormore Arabic/Hebrew charactersplace the caret at the beginning of the lineselect the next two characters, to include one bidi characters.The selection background includes unselected characters. '}
